articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: These Two U.S. Cities Are The Most Vulnerable To Severe Space Weather - Forbes
articles.description: Washington, D.C. and Milwaukee power grids are the most at risk from space weather, and there is the potential for widespread infrastructure damage, says new research.

articles.author: Anil Ganti
articles.title: Intel claims 13th and 14th-gen Raptor Lake laptop chips are not affected by their desktop counterparts' instability issues - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Alderon Games, one of the developers that flagged the instability issues of 14th and 13th-gen Raptor Lake desktop chips, says they're experiencing similar issues on HX-branded laptop chips. An Intel spokesperson insists its laptop chips are fine and attribute…
articles.content: Game developers and users alike highlighted numerous problems with Intel's 13th and 14th-gen Raptor Lake processors, specifically high-end SKUs like the Core i9-13900K and Core i9-14900K. Even though… [+1876 chars]
